entities.name: house-elf liberation front
entities.description: The House-Elf Liberation Front is mentioned as an organization that Hermione is trying to lead. It is described as a group that aims to stir up the house-elves into rebellion.

entities.name: hous e-elves
entities.description: The house-elves are mentioned as a group of individuals who are being led by Hermione. They are described as needing to take clothes and salaries.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the person leading the House-Elf Liberation Front. She is trying to stir up the house-elves into rebellion.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as a person who is skeptical of Hermione's plan to lead the house-elves on strike.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as a person who is warning Hermione not to upset the house-elves by telling them they have to take clothes and salaries.

relationships.description: Hermione is leading the House-Elf Liberation Front.
George and his brother Fred invented the Canary Creams.
